name: SSSXR.2021.Q.MT1
description:
# Description

This is a set of experimental contents for an XR (VR/AR) application to enable us to simulate earthquake situations in a real-life room. To evaluate the feature, we made four contents (MT1-C1, MT1-C2i, MT1-C2r, MT1-C3) and conduct an experiment with them while 2021/12/10 Fri. - 2021/12/23 Thu. This package has three immersive contents of them except MT1-C1 (a 360 video).

# How to install and experience

  1. Get the tested or compatible device (Quest 2).
  2. Enable developer mode of the Quest 2 and set up and allow ADB with your computer. (cf. https://developer.oculus.com/documentation/native/android/mobile-device-setup/ )
  3. Install this package with Oculus Developer Hub,  SideQuest, or other tools that is providing a sideloading feature that you like.
  4. In Quest2, select the category of Unknown Sources from the applications menu.
  5. Find and start our application.
  6. In the first scene, three monoliths appear to your front. Select one of them and grab it. Then you can experience each content.

Tips:

  • To recenter your position, press the Oculus button longly.
  • To experience other content, restarting this application is needed.
  • To enable hand tracking, see the settings of your device.

# Tested Environment

  • Oculus Quest 2 (currently named as Meta Quest 2) v35
  • Oculus Quest 2 (currently named as Meta Quest 2) v37
